wikitext.*:
The '''War of the Ring''' may refer to:
==Middle-earth==
*'''[[War of the Ring]]''', a major war in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' which ended following the destruction of [[The One Ring]].
==Books==
* ''[[The War of the Ring]]'', the eighth book in ''[[The History of Middle-earth]]'' series, and the third of ''[[The History of The Lord of the Rings]]''.
* ''The War of the Ring'', the name of Book V in some editions of ''The Lord of the Rings''.
==Adaptations==
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'', a [[2004]] video game by [[Sierra Entertainment]].
* ''[[War of the Ring (1977 board game)|War of the Ring]]'', a [[1979]] board game.
* ''[[War of the Ring (2004 board game)|War of the Ring]]'', a [[2004]] board game.
* ''[[War of the Ring: Second Edition (2011 board game)|War of the Ring: Second Edition]]'', a [[2011]] board game by [[ARES Games]].
* ''[[War of the Ring: The Card Game]]'', a [[2023]] board game by ARES Games.
* ''The Appendices Part 5: The War of the Ring'', disc three of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]].
* ''War of the Ring'', a game mode in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II|The Battle for Middle-earth II]] and [[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king|The Rise of the Witch-King]].
* ''[[The War of the Ring (Eamon series)|The War of the Ring]]'', a series of games made by [[Eamon (video game)|Eamon]].
* [[War of the Ring (2009 book)|''War of the Ring'' (2009 book)]], a [[2009]] supplement for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.
* ''[[War of the Ring: Battlehosts]]'', a [[2010]] supplement for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.
